section.name: Joda Beans
section.p: A user interface generator for Joda-Beans.
Joda-Beans provides a small framework that adds properties to Java, greatly enhancing JavaBeans. This UI project uses the meta-data available in Joda-Beans to create a user interface.
While the user interface created by this project will never match a hand-coded UI, it will suffice for many scenarios. The key advantage is that it is quick to create a usable UI.
Joda-Beans-UI is licensed under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 licence.
